Content: Theldeniya Magistrate has re-remanded 9 suspects who were arrested over the recent incidents in Digana until 10th of this month. The suspects were produced before the Theldeniya Magistrate today (Apr. 02). Meanwhile, Samantha Perera who was elected Kundasale Pradeshiya Sabha under the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna ticket has made a request to attend a meeting on 6th and the Magistrate allowed his request. Police also produced the CCTV footage relating to the incident to the courts. The Magistrate also ordered to produce the leader of Mahason Balakaya, Amith Weerasinghe in courts on 10th of April.
